tooltip.createhorsepower.horse_crank.not: Mob is not a valid worker
createhorsepower.ponder.horse_crank.head: Using Horse Crank
createhorsepower.ponder.horse_crank.text: To use a horse crank you first need to have valid blocks underneath it
Valid blocks are listed in the config
When a valid worker is attached the crank will produce stress
You can attach a any mob in the config to turn it into a worker
